mean_cn: vt. 揭开，公布；  vi. 揭开
mean_en: to remove a covering like a curtain from a new structure at a formal ceremony in order to show the opening or finishing of a new building or work of art
word_etyma: un打开 + veil盖上→unveil揭开，揭幕
sentence: At the ceremony, they unveiled a statue in memory of the Long March.
sentence_trans: 在典礼上，他们揭开了这尊纪念红军长征的雕像。
